<title level="1" right="Rules">[Ice](/Rules.aspx?ID=596)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 512 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Icy ground is both uneven ground and difficult terrain, as characters slip and slide due to poor traction.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
